Game: My Horse & Me 2007-11-23T00:00:00-08:00 My Horse & Me is a show jumping video game published by Atari for the Nintendo Wii, Nintendo DS, and Windows. It is the first game released by Atari under their exclusive partnership with the FEI. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/d8799456-3cd5-4f0b-8860-8af383f88d35.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/3feca91e-0ce6-42e5-9338-b67e85344ef6.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/a7b37b2f-3e1c-4078-8c16-47f516b06d6d.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/f898b56c-031b-4588-811a-e26a40a7c257.png https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/My_Horse_%26_Me Action W!Games Atari
